article: Sam goes home from school. He's hungry .And he has a lot of homework. He wants to see Mike and  _  football, too. He doesn't have  much  time. But please  don't  eat too much." Sam eats some cakes. Then he sits  _  at the table. He opens his book and begins to write. Mrs Green  _  to the shop. Mrs Green comes back  _  the shop. Sam is  _  .
